### ğŸ“ What you need to know

Donâ€™t worry: Bitcoin treasury giant Strategy wonâ€™t take _all_ the BTC, co-founder and Executive Chairman Michael Saylor assured investors this weekâ€”but it does want to hold an even more massive share of the supply.

Not content with holding over $71 billion worth of BTC, or more than 3% of the current circulating supply, Saylor said Friday that he thinks the firm could ultimately [own upwards of 7%](https://decrypt.co/333164/strategy-could-buy-7-percent-bitcoin-supply-michael-saylor) of the total BTC supply. Thatâ€™s 1.47 million BTC, or about $167 billion worth as of now.

"We wouldn't want to own all of itâ€”we want everyone else to have their piece," said Saylor.

And thatâ€™s not all. Strategy CEO Phong Le said during Thursdayâ€™s earnings call that the company aims to [have the biggest corporate treasury](https://decrypt.co/333218/public-keys-strategy-metaplanet-bitcoin-coinbase-xrp), regardless of asset type, aiming to top Berkshire Hathawayâ€™s $328 billion stash of cash and cash equivalents.
